statements: SELECT * FROM WinePrices WHERE wine_id = 1;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM WinePrices WHERE vintage_year = 2010;
SELECT region, price FROM WinePrices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT * FROM WinePrices WHERE date_of_purchase BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM WinePrices ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT * FROM WinePrices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY date_of_purchase DESC
SELECT wine_name, region, vintage_year FROM WinePrices WHERE region = 'Napa Valley'
SELECT wine_name, price FROM WinePrices WHERE vintage_year >= 2010 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT region, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM WinePrices GROUP BY region
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM WinePrices ORDER BY region
SELECT * FROM WinePrices WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM WinePrices WHERE vintage_year = 2019 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT taster_name, country_of_origin FROM WineTasters WHERE taster_type = 'Sommelier';
SELECT wine_name, price, vintage_year FROM WinePrices WHERE price < 100.00 AND vintage_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015;
SELECT * FROM WineTasters WHERE country_of_origin = 'France' ORDER BY taster_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WinePrices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY vintage_year DESC;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM WinePrices WHERE vintage_year = 2010 AND price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT taster_name, country_of_origin FROM WineTasters WHERE taster_type = 'Sommelier' ORDER BY country_of_origin, taster_name;
SELECT wine_name, price, vintage_year FROM WinePrices WHERE wine_name LIKE '%cabernet%' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM WineTasters WHERE country_of_origin = 'France' OR country_of_origin = 'Italy' ORDER BY taster_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM wine_prices;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM wine_prices WHERE region = 'France';
SELECT taster_name, location FROM wine_tasters ORDER BY taster_name ASC;
SELECT wine_name, vintage_year, price FROM wine_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT taster_name, rating FROM wine_tasters INNER JOIN wine_reviews ON wine_tasters.taster_id = wine_reviews.taster_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM wine_prices ORDER BY price DESC, vintage_year ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM wine_prices WHERE region='France' AND vintage_year=2010;
SELECT taster_name, location FROM wine_tasters WHERE location='California' ORDER BY taster_name ASC;
SELECT wp.wine_name, wr.rating FROM wine_prices wp JOIN wine_reviews wr ON wp.id = wr.wine_id WHERE wr.rating >= 90;
SELECT wr.notes FROM wine_reviews wr JOIN wine_tasters wt ON wr.taster_id = wt.taster_id WHERE wt.location='New York';
SELECT * FROM wine_prices;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM wine_prices WHERE vintage = 2019;
SELECT region_name, country FROM wine_regions ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT name, favorite_region FROM tasters WHERE taster_level = 'Expert';
SELECT t.taster_id, w.wine_name, t.purchase_date FROM transactions t JOIN wine_prices w ON t.wine_id = w.id;
SELECT * FROM wine_prices WHERE region = 'Bordeaux';
SELECT wine_name, vintage, price FROM wine_prices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT t.name, w.wine_name, t.taster_level FROM tasters t JOIN transactions tr ON t.id = tr.taster_id JOIN wine_prices w ON tr.wine_id = w.id WHERE tr.quantity >= 3;

SELECT wr.region_name, wr.country, COUNT(wp.id) AS total_wines FROM wine_regions wr LEFT JOIN wine_prices wp ON wr.region_name = wp.region GROUP BY wr.region_name, wr.country ORDER BY total_wines DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT w.wine_name, w.vintage FROM wine_prices w JOIN transactions t ON w.id = t.wine_id WHERE t.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wine_prices
SELECT wine_name, vintage_year, price FROM wine_prices ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT region, COUNT(*) AS count FROM wine_prices GROUP BY region
SELECT * FROM vineyards WHERE established_year > 1990
SELECT producer_name, region FROM wine_producers WHERE established_year < 1980
SELECT * FROM wine_prices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY vintage_year DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT wine_name, price FROM wine_prices WHERE region = 'Napa Valley' AND vintage_year = 2010;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, region FROM wine_prices GROUP BY region HAVING AVG(price) > 50 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT producer_name, region, established_year FROM wine_producers WHERE region LIKE '%France%' OR region LIKE '%Italy%' ORDER BY established_year;
SELECT vineyard_name, established_year FROM vineyards WHERE established_year BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000;
